text: Starshine Records was a record label started in the late 1960s by Floyd Phillips of Warren, Ohio. He managed and recorded some of the local bands in the N.E. Ohio area including Freeman Sound, Stars And Stripes, Travis, Biggy Rat and Southwind. By far his greatest discovery was Morly Grey and their album "The Only Truth"A list of starshine releases ==References== Category:Defunct record labels of the United States Category:American independent record labels Category:Warren, Ohio
title: Starshine Records
